name: weavejs
description: Collection of visualization tools and UI for the WeaveJS project.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:as && npm run clean:ts
scripts.compile: npm run compile-as && npm run compile-astypings && npm run compile-ts && npm run compile-libs && mkdirp lib && node run-ts build
scripts.compile-refs: node run-ts main-import-tool -d WeaveTSJS/src/weavejs -f WeaveTSJS/src/_references.ts && npm run compile-librefs
scripts.compile-libs: npm run compile-librefs && tsc -p ./WeaveTSJS/tsconfig-libs.json && babel WeaveTSJS/bin/es6/libs.js --out-file WeaveTSJS/bin/js/libs.js -s
scripts.compile-ts: npm run compile-refs && tsc -p ./WeaveTSJS/tsconfig.json && mkdirp ./WeaveTSJS/bin/js && babel ./WeaveTSJS/bin/es6/weavejs.js --out-file ./WeaveTSJS/bin/js/weavejs.js -s && cp ./WeaveTSJS/bin/es6/weavejs.d.ts ./weave-typings/

author: WeaveTeam <devteam@iweave.com>
